name: The Warlock
description:
The Warlock is a short demo for a bullethell-platformer-metroidvania I have been working on. Featuring a dozen interconnecting rooms, half a dozen enemies and a boss, The Warlock pits you against the evil Skull monster that dwells in the great forest of Celestia.

How to play:

A&D / Arrow Keys - move left and right
Space / W - jump
Mouse - aim
Left Mouse Button - Shoot
Shift - Dash [Note that this power-up most be unlocked in game]
